group_1.narration: I bought a new swimsuit,@and thought I would put away my old one.
Even though I keep thinking I should throw it out,@I can't bring myself to do it.@After all, my old swimsuit is full of memories.

group_1.textRight: And so!@Let's all go to the beach tomorrow!
Hm, hm!

group_1.textLeft: I don't have a swimsuit, Tsuruno!

group_1.textRight: Oh, you didn't pack it up in a cardboard box when @you were moving?
I thought I saw one when we were cleaning the @other day.

group_1.textLeft: I do have one, but...@It really doesn't look good on me...

group_1.narration: That's right--@this swimsuit carries bitter memories.

group_1.textLeft: I-Isn't this swimsuit a little... flashy for me?

group_1.textRight: Not at all, Iroha!
Yeah, not at all! This sort of style is normal for @middle schoolers, these days!
And it's the perfect color for you!
Come on, if you keep worrying about it you won't @be able to make a decision.
Can't you just trust your friends' judgement in @times like this?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah, you're right. Then I'll get this one.

group_1.narration: The truth is that I didn't really like it.@Just thinking about wearing it was so embarassing.@I couldn't help it.@But it was bad of me to hesitate so much...
Maybe it was because of how impatient they were...@Instead of just obediently accepting their words,@it was like they were making @dark rain clouds inside my chest...
I bought the swimsuit even though I didn't want to.@And then on the day that we were supposed@to go to the pool, I stayed home...
That's why, even if Tsuruno invited me to go to the beach...@I haven't wanted to go since that day.
But...

group_1.textRight: If it's making Iroha uncomfortable, we'll just go to @the beach another time.
Hold up!
Then I'll look!@And tell you if it looks good on you or not!
Yeah, Felicia!
It's a little disappointing, but we'll go next time.

group_1.textLeft: But I would like to see it...

group_1.textRight: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Sana?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, if it's just showing you...

group_1.textRight: Iroha, you're allowed to refuse if you don't want to, understand?

group_1.narration: I decided to show the others my old swimsuit.
Looking back on it,@maybe I was a little excited.

group_1.textRight: What's with that?

group_1.textLeft: Eh, so it's... really no good...?

group_1.textRight: No, it's totally normal.@Seems like it'd suit you?
Yeah, it's like a perfect aesthetic-- @that's what she means!

group_1.textLeft: Are you just saying that because you want to go to @the beach?

group_1.textRight: Tsuruno Yui's aesthetic judgements @are 100% unbiased!
[chara:100301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Look! Look at the sparkle in my eyes!

group_1.textLeft: I also... think it would look good...!

group_1.textRight: Huh?
Yes, I think it would look good on you too.@It could be nice to see you try it on.

group_1.narration: Everyone's words cleared up the rain clouds in my chest.
Hearing those words, it was as if the swimsuit@that I had only looked at as if its fabric had faded...@was suddenly vivid again.@I started to think that it was cute.
I know, now.
I had thought so negatively-- I had hated it.@Back then, I just couldn't@ believe the words of my classmates.
Because I knew that I was only being invited@to even out the numbers...
That's why, back then...@There was only one thing that could clear up my heart.
And it was hearing from everyone at Mikazuki Villa that the swimsuit looked good on me.
When I think about it now,@I wish that I had been able to show them.
After all...
―Felicia―@Hey, hey, Tsuruno! Take that!
―Tsuruno―@Aah! Noo, Felicia!
―Sana―@(I-I can play with everyone at the beach...!)
―Yachiyo―@If you keep that floaty forever,@you'll never learn how to swim, you know.
―Iroha―@D-don't tug me, Yachiyo!@I don't need to swim!
Yachiyo! Iroha!
―Iroha―@Eh?
―Yachiyo―@Hm?
―Tsuruno―@I, Tsuruno Yui, have helped myself to a perfect double shot!
These fun memories with everyone from Mikazuki Villa@are filling up my chest.
